metadata.title: CVE-2011-4604 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: The bat_socket_read function in net/batman-adv/icmp_socket.c in the Linuxkernel before 3.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedbatman-adv ICMP packet.

criterions.comment: batmand package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
